Hmm, the key here is to model the effect of these operations and see under what conditions the array can be made uniform in parity. Let's think about the parity changes.

But since we can do these any number of times, maybe we can model the number of times each operation is done modulo 2, because doing an operation twice is equivalent to not doing it at all (since adding 2 doesn't change parity).
